title: Ball Sort
description: Sort colored balls into tubes - each tube should contain only one color

title: Block Drop
description: Drop colored blocks into columns. Match adjacent same-colored blocks to merge and score!

title: Breakout Bouncer
description: Classic brick-breaker with sci-fi neon assets

title: Bubble Shooter
description: Match 3+ bubbles of the same color to pop them and clear the board

title: Cats falling objects
description: A game where I catch falling apples but avoid the bombs

title: Cats platformer
description: A platformer where a cat jumps between clouds to collect stars

title: Connect 4
description: Drop discs to connect four in a row

title: Domino Chain
description: Place dominoes and watch them fall in a satisfying chain reaction

title: Drop & Pop
description: Drop fruits and merge matching pairs into bigger fruits! Inspired by Suika Game.

title: Dungeon Crawler
description: Grid-based dungeon exploration with inventory and state transitions

title: Flappy Bird
description: Tap to fly through the pipes without hitting them
Slide tiles to combine matching numbers and reach 2048!

title: Gem Crush
description: Match 3 or more gems to clear them and score points!

title: Ice Slide
description: Push ice blocks to their goals - they slide until they hit something!

title: Memory Match
description: Flip cards to find matching pairs

title: Block Stacker
description: Stack blocks as high as you can! Higher stacks = more points!

title: Pinball Lite
description: Pinball table with bumpers, flippers - reach 5000 points to win!

title: Puyo Puyo
description: Match 4+ same-colored puyos to pop them and create chains!

title: RPG Progression Demo
description: Collect gems for XP and gold coins for resources. Level up to unlock abilities!

title: Simple Platformer
description: Jump between platforms, collect coins, reach the goal flag

title: Slopeggle
description: Clear all orange pegs by bouncing a ball through the board

title: Fruit Slots
description: Classic 5-reel fruit machine with free spins and bonuses

title: Sports projectile
description: A game where I launch balls at stacked blocks to knock them down

title: Stack & Match
description: Place tiles on a grid to match 3+ adjacent same-color tiles

title: Tip the Scale
description: Place weights on a seesaw to achieve perfect balance

title: Tower Defense
description: Defend your base from waves of enemies. Towers target nearest enemies and fire projectiles. Enemies follow a path to reach your base.
